data.subject_template: Time to blame your friend {inviter_username} for inviting you to Heckfire.
data.message_template:
Welcome to Heckfire, {invitee_username}. Now you've gone and done it - prepare for some crazy times and even crazier battles. Since you were invited by your friend,  {inviter_username}, they'll reap the rewards of your blood, sweat, and tears. 

Get to Town Hall level 10, and they'll be forever in your debt. Might even name their first child after you, too. Feel free to message them in the game to ask for advice and questions. That username again, if you are need help is: {inviter_username}. You should send them a message. They're probably thinking about you right now.
data.message:
Welcome to Heckfire, titanlevel5. Now you've gone and done it - prepare for some crazy times and even crazier battles. Since you were invited by your friend,  swagdaddiekevz, they'll reap the rewards of your blood, sweat, and tears. 

Get to Town Hall level 10, and they'll be forever in your debt. Might even name their first child after you, too. Feel free to message them in the game to ask for advice and questions. That username again, if you are need help is: swagdaddiekevz. You should send them a message. They're probably thinking about you right now.
data.subject: Time to blame your friend swagdaddiekevz for inviting you to Heckfire.
Welcome all!
data.message:
Welcome to PugsBeDammed. This will be a competive clan aiming to be top 3 on this realm. This clan will have requirements but nothing impossible. Discord server will be created soon. 

Make sure to ask questions for all the new players. I'll be mailing daily during the meta event on what you should be doing daily

Clan is now full so I've enabled application only.

Please reply if interested in leadership positions. I'll be looking for 4 R4s (second in command)

data.subject: Today Quests
data.message:
Stockpile daily quest- hit monsters or mine resource nodes to complete this quest. Pretty easy

Dragon quest (changes daily): Hit swamp monsters or mine swamp resource nodes. This helps you and the clan!

Hourly quest change per hour. Complete them if you can for rewards

data.subject: Daily Quest 9/2
data.message:
Daily Dragon quest - Grassland. Make sure to kill goblins and mine grassland nodes! This helps you and the clan!

Meta event - Troops/Construction. Make sure to build buildings and train troops for this one. The event gives event tokens which give huge rewards

Note thru this event the market will have a new tab. Make sure to grab your FREE daily chest from this tab

data.subject: Referal System
data.message:
I need everyone to set a referal to ensure we get max rewards. You can use my name or another clan members name but their account has to be older for it to work

How to:

Purple arrow - > Extra - > scroll down to referal - > enter players name

You can send daily chests to each other containing resources and brew. Make sure to add someone active (I'm active 😊)

data.subject: *Hardcore* Free For All Reminder !
data.message:
Greeting Citizens of Heckfire,

This is a reminder that the quest "Hardcore Free For All" is kills only. A good way to remember this is that it always runs with "Sacrificin' Soldiers" which rewards *own* troop death. For further information, please read the details section of each quest.

- The Heckfire Team

data.subject: Raid Issue Update
data.message:
Greeting Citizen of Heckfire,

There is currently a Raid issue that is preventing players from scoring in their raids, collecting the rewards, and sometimes making the Daily Events tab disappear. We have identified the cause and are currently looking into the fix, so hang tight!

A comp plan will also be worked on after the fix is released. In the meantime, please refrain from starting any new raids. Your patience is greatly appreciated as we sort this out!

Sincerely,
The Heckfire Team

data.subject: Raid Issue Update 2
data.message:
Greetings Citizens of Heckfire,

Just to update you! Unfortunately the fix will probably be deployed after reset. But we are working as fast as we can as we know it's going to be Supply Stockpile!

data.subject: Raid Issue Update 3
data.message:
Greetings Citizens of Heckfire,

Thanks for hanging tight! A fix should be on the way around 10am (PT). It's not as soon as we would like but we want to make sure it fully works before being releasing to you, wonderful folks.

As mentioned before, a comp will be released after the fix! Your patience is ever appreciated <3

Sincerely,
The Heckfire Team

data.subject: Raid Issue Update 4: Raid is fixed!
data.message:
Greetings Citizens of Heckfire,

The raid issues have now been fixed. Raid away!!!

A comp will be out as soon as we can. Thanks for the patience!

Sincerely,
The Heckfire Team

data.subject: Raids Information Update
data.message:
Greetings Citizens of Heckfire,

We have searched far and wide for the cause of bugged raids last week.

It appears that the issues are due to the Town Hall levels of clan leaders are lower than the feature/competition requirement. Clan leaders need to be at least Town Hall 7 or higher in order for the Raids to work properly!

This information will also provided in the quest details for Raid Racer.

Thank you for your patience as we worked through this issue!

-The Heckfire Team

data.subject: ✨🔥 Heckin' MEGA SALE🔥 ✨
data.message:
Greetings Citizens of Heckfire!

New content means new, more brutal challenges ahead. It's time to level up with our HECKIN' MEGA SALE!

All weekend long, starting at Friday @ 2:00PM PT and going all the way until Monday @ 2:00PM PT head to the shop to check out awesome deals, with special offers on ways to grow your Dragons into realm ending terrors, bust out mad scientist levels of research, and whip your raiding party into a Mermolga mincing MACHINE.

<link=https://forums.kingdomsofheckfire.com/threads/%E2%9C%A8%F0%9F%94%A5-heckin-mega-sale%F0%9F%94%A5-%E2%9C%A8.2488/>Check out our forum post for more info!</link>

Good luck and happy slaying!
-The Heckfire Team

data.subject: End of Event Wrap Up Schedule!
data.message:
Greetings Citizens of Heckfire,

Big Ham on Campus and A Very Special Heckfire… events will be ending soon.

Here are the dates and times when event items will expire:

Event quests and meta event ends: - Thursday, September 23rd - 3PM (PT)

Event chests with event points ends: - Thursday, September 23rd - 3PM (PT)

Event in-app purchases end: - Thursday, September 23rd- 2PM (PT)

Event chests without event points are available between: - Starts on Thursday, September 23rd - 3PM PT active until Thursday, September 30th - 2PM (PT)

Post-event in-app purchases are available between: - Starts on Thursday, September 23rd - 3PM PT active until Thursday, September 30th - 2PM (PT) Daily Reset

Finish strong!

- The Heckfire Team
